title: Excellent timer with decent world clock
comment: Timer is straightforward and no-nonsense and gets the job done. It also has a pretty good world clock, although its lack of 24-hour time support holds me back from using it.
Boring it has a world clock but you can't even pause the timer
im loved it
Awesome awesome awesome

title: The best Android stopwatch
comment: It works well. As a bonus, it's Apache licensed and does not require any special permissions.

title: nice
comment: please make it show list of previous laps in stopwatch.

title: Simply perfect!
comment: No bunch of BS permissions, rate me option crap. This is one good example of complete and simple application.

title: Good
comment: Useful timer

title: It wont let me dowload it at all and im really frustrated!
Good, but should show notifications
comment: I really think it should show notifications when running in the background, like the AOSP clock.

title: Lightwieght and functional app
comment: Lightwieght, functional, requires no permissions and is open-source. What else could we possibly need? Perfect application.  Thank you so much for such an awesome open-source app!

title: Simple and Effective
comment: Elegantly does what it was designed to do. No ads or bloated features. I do agreee with other reviewers that a louder alarm option would be useful. Well done!

title: no widgets
comment: Nice app but does not provide any widgets despite mentioning them in the description.

title: Deserves recognition
comment: Lots of competition. But incomparable: free, no ads, open source. The timer could benefit from a history of more than 1 time. Else perfect.

title: Choosing time zones is a bit difficult
comment: It's a bit difficult to slide to choose a time zone

title: Simply the best Android stopwatch/timer
comment: Clean interface and just a pleasure to use!

title: Excellent
comment: The only thing this is missing is the ability to keep the screen from sleeping. Great work!

title: Simple and effective.
comment: Great app. Ad-free. Functions exactly as you'd hope. A preference thing, having tenths of a second in the countdown might be a nice aesthetic. A bigger countdown clock might also be nice in landscape and I agree a louder alarm sound would be nice. But these are all preferences for some great work this dev is doing. Thanks!!

title: Nice looking timer/stopwatch!
comment: Very nice app. Everything feels nice to operate and looks nice too. I will be using this to replace another timer that has become too naggy with its ads.   If I could request one thing from dev: On the countdown timer side, the sounds are all very sedate, and perhaps even too quiet. One loud/sharp traditional alarm sound option would be very helpful. Good luck with your app btw.

title: Great app!
comment: Great app, intuitive, looks good.   Thanks! =)

title: world clock, timer, stopwatch with laps
comment: This app is designed to do exactly what it says nothing more, nothing less, no special permissions.  World clocks are set based off + or - hours with a sliding bar, then you can select say eastern standard time.  Stopwatch, once started there is a lap button you can use to keep track of your laps, Stopwatch will show full time and not the lap time. Time for timer is set by selecting hours, minutes, seconds via a wheel of numbers. Thank you for a great app

title: Nice
comment: Looks and works great. Thanks!

title: All you need
comment: Simple, descent and ad free app!

title: Awesome
comment: Simple functional no ads

title: Good!
comment: Finally a decent app! The stopwatch numbers bounce around on my screen though. Galaxy Nexus
